'''Warmi Mach'ay' (Quechua warmi woman, mach'ay cave, "woman cave", Hispanicized spelling Huarmimachay'') is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about  high. It is situated in the Huancavelica Region, Huancavelica Province, Acobambilla District, and in the Jun√≠n Region, Huancayo Province, Chongos Alto District. Warmi Mach'ay lies between the lakes named Warmiqucha in the southeast and Quylluqucha in the northwest.
